short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QPR fans can now have club news at their fingertips by downloading the all-new Official QPR Homepage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don't miss a piece of QPR news! 

The page - one of the first of its kind in English football - will provide supporters with the latest QPR news every time they open a new tab on Google Chrome. 

As well as this, the homepage is fully equipped with iconic background images and videos, and is completely FREE to download.
